summary: This is a Dark Brotherhood color scheme re-texture of the dragon scale armor set and nightin gale hood INCLUDES FEMALE DRAGONS SCALE ARMOR 2
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple Dark Brotherhood re-texture of the dragon scale armor set and the nightin gale hood.
WARNING: THESE RE-TEXTURE EVERY DRAGON SCALE ARMOR SET IN THE WHOLE GAME!! SAME WITH THE NIGHTINGALE HOOD!!
to instal just extract to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

to get the armor just use the console to add it to your inventory or craft it at any blacksmith if you have the required items/skil/perk to make dragon scale armor as for the Nighingale hood just use the console command \"player.additem 000FCC12 1\" with out the \"\"

This also includes the female dragon scale armor to textured in the same theme
author: Reaper761

files.name: Dragonscale DB nighetn gale hood DB
